ValidationRule.description: "Case Priority", "Customer update Frequency", "Communication Channel" fields should be mandatory for technical issue cases.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: $Profile.Name <> $Label.API_data_Load_Profile && AND( ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Propose to Close' ) , (RecordType.Name = 'Technical Issue'), (NOT(ISPICKVAL(Origin , 'Quick Case'))), OR(ISBLANK( TEXT( Case_Priority__c )) , ISBLANK( TEXT( TSLI_threshold__c)) , ISBLANK(TEXT ( Communication_Channel__c )) ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: case priority, TSLI Threshold, communication channel fields should be mandatory.
